name: Ravzy's Gift-Giving Rumble
description:
A visual novel based in YogStudios.

I have no time to fill this in properly.

Featuring all your favourites:

Lewis!

Simon!

Angory Tom!

The Spiffing Brit!

Hat Films!

...and many (okay, like four) more!

Everything by me except the music; credits in the game menu.

Missing things:

- A much-needed knocking sound effect

- Ravsy's voice

- Probably other stuff

I hope this works!

Enjoy!

- @wrathor_
